languages.text: {n}Ульфар свирепо сверкает глазами.{/n} "Остановись здесь, Торбальд. Эт{mf|от|а} смертн{mf|ый|ая} спас{mf||ла} меня из плена и доказал{mf||а} свою доблесть. Дерзостей, обращенных к {mf|нему|ней}, я не потерплю".
{n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар свирепо сверкает глазами.{/n} "Остановись здесь, Торбальд. Эт{mf|от|а} смертн{mf|ый|ая} спас{mf||ла} меня из плена и доказал{mf||а} свою доблесть. Дерзостей, обращенных к {mf|нему|ней}, я не потерплю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的双眼中闪烁着怒火。{/n}“住口，索巴德。正是这个凡人将我从牢笼中拯救出来，证明了{mf|他|她}的勇气。如果有谁胆敢蔑视{mf|他|她}，我绝不会袖手旁观。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的双眼中闪烁着怒火。{/n}“住口，索巴德。正是这个凡人将我从牢笼中拯救出来，证明了{mf|他|她}的勇气。如果有谁胆敢蔑视{mf|他|她}，我绝不会袖手旁观。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの目に怒りが灯る。{/n}「そこまでだ、トールバルド。この人間は囚われの身となっていた俺を救い、その武勇を証明した。この者への無礼を黙って見過ごすわけにはいかない」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの目に怒りが灯る。{/n}「そこまでだ、トールバルド。この人間は囚われの身となっていた俺を救い、その武勇を証明した。この者への無礼を黙って見過ごすわけにはいかない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Ulfar refulgen con furia.{/n} «Quieto ahí, Thorbald. Est{mf|e|a} mortal me rescató del cautiverio y me demostró su valía. No toleraré que le faltes al respeto».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Ulfar refulgen con furia.{/n} «Quieto ahí, Thorbald. Est{mf|e|a} mortal me rescató del cautiverio y me demostró su valía. No toleraré que le faltes al respeto».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Ulfar flamboie de colère.{/n} « Assez, Thorbald. {mf|Ce mortel|Cette mortelle} m'a libéré et a prouvé sa valeur. Je ne te laisserai pas lui manquer de respect. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Ulfar flamboie de colère.{/n} « Assez, Thorbald. {mf|Ce mortel|Cette mortelle} m'a libéré et a prouvé sa valeur. Je ne te laisserai pas lui manquer de respect. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Augen blitzen vor Wut.{/n} "Haltet ein, Thorbald. {mf|Dieser|Diese} Sterbliche hat mich aus der Gefangenschaft gerettet und {mf|seinen|ihren} Wert bewiesen. Ich werde nicht dabeistehen und zulassen, dass {mf|er|sie} respektlos behandelt wird."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars Augen blitzen vor Wut.{/n} "Haltet ein, Thorbald. {mf|Dieser|Diese} Sterbliche hat mich aus der Gefangenschaft gerettet und {mf|seinen|ihren} Wert bewiesen. Ich werde nicht dabeistehen und zulassen, dass {mf|er|sie} respektlos behandelt wird."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın gözleri öfkeyle parlıyor.{/n} "Orada duracaksın Thorbald. Bu fâni beni tutsaklıktan kurtararak yiğitliğini kanıtladı. Öyle durup ona saygısızlık etmeni izleyecek değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's eyes flash with fury.{/n} "Stop there, Thorbald. This mortal rescued me from captivity and proved {mf|his|her} valour. I will not stand here and allow {mf|him|her} to be disrespected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın gözleri öfkeyle parlıyor.{/n} "Orada duracaksın Thorbald. Bu fâni beni tutsaklıktan kurtardı ve yiğitliğini kanıtladı. Öylece durup ona saygısızlık etmeni izleyemem."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
